article.name: How can I stay up to date on Mackerel’s ongoing development?
article.title: How can I stay up to date on Mackerel’s ongoing development?
article.body:
If you have encountered a problem within Mackerel, it’s likely we are in the process of working to fix it. To see the latest information and updates about development, please follow us on twitter @mackerelio or subscribe to our status page status.mackerel.io.

Stay up to date by registering your email via the 'SUBSCRIBE' button located at the top of our status page status.mackerel.io.
